page.title: 06FOUR MARKS PLAYGROUP
page.content: VILLAGE HALL PLAYGROUP: Four Marks playgroup has 22 children coming every day and 55 children altogether. It has been going on for 15 years, every morning between 9.30-12.00, five days a week. They have 4 supervisors, two full time and two part-time. Children play with sand, water, playdough, and lego; they do painting, cooking, modeling from boxes, planting seeds, reading and use a home corner as a shop, bank or post office and cafe. They also learn to mix with other people, play, share, have freedom to do different things which they may not be able to do at home. Special events are held like sports day, outings, Christmas play and party and they visit farms, the recreation ground and have visitors such as Policemen, road safety and dental hygienist. The group is self-financed.
